columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: The date and time when the user clicked on the link

columns.name: Url
columns.description: The full URL that was clicked on by the user

columns.name: ActionType
columns.description: Indicates whether the click was allowed or blocked (or blocked due to policy)

columns.name: AccountUpn
columns.description: UPN of the account that clicked on the link

columns.name: Workload
columns.description: The application from which the user clicked on the link (Email, Office, Teams)

columns.name: NetworkMessageId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the email that contains the clicked link

columns.name: ThreatTypes
columns.description: Verdict at the time of click (malware, phish, other threats)

columns.name: DetectionMethods
columns.description: Detection technology used to identify the threat at the time of click

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: Public IP address of the device from which the user clicked on the link

columns.name: IsClickedThrough
columns.description: Indicates whether the user was able to click through to the original URL (1/0)

columns.name: UrlChain
columns.description: For redirection scenarios, URLs present in the redirection chain

columns.name: ReportId
columns.description: Unique identifier for a click event
